sentences.sContent: It reflects the vicissitude of society.
sentences.sCn: 它反映了社会的变迁兴衰。

sentences.sContent: So great a vicissitude in his life could not at once be received as real.
sentences.sContent_eng: So great a vicissitude in his life could not at once be received as real.
sentences.sCn: 他的生活中发生了如此巨大的变迁，他一时还无法相信是真的。

sentences.sContent: This kind of boundary is relative, only has the temporary stability and the validity, it along with situation change, but unceasing vicissitude.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of boundary is relative, only has the temporary stability and the validity, it along with situation change, but unceasing vicissitude.
sentences.sCn: 这种边界是相对的，仅具有暂时的稳定性和有效性，它随着情境的变化而不断变迁。

synos.tran: 变迁；盛衰；变化无常；变迁兴衰
